review: When I entered the room he was not present, his junior doctor was there. While I was explaining the problem to his junior doctor, he entered but couldn't took botheration to hear to my full history of disease and simply directed his junior doctor to follow the treatment prescribed by a previous doctor of AIIMS.  I was full of questions which were not replied by anyone. So treatment was incomplete and I have to see another doctor now.

review: He saved my Mother when she had a fatal heart attack. He is Brilliant. India needs more people like Dr Aseem Dhall.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: Doctor is really nice, no annoying attitude that doctors normally have. Listens to you patiently and explains the condition in a polite manner. Highly recommended doctor.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,
review: It was quite nice ..doctor was trying to go to root cause of problem and not just treating external sympyoms

Visited first time, I was heard patiently and was explained well by the Doctor, whatsoever I asked about the disease and medications. The environment in the clinic is absolutely fine, not much time to wait.
Overall experience remained good.

review: Dr. Aseem Dhall has a very pleasant personality . Prescribes lesser medicine and listens the problem patiently.

review: I booked the appointment for my father. Doctor is a very polite person and he patiently listened to the issues my father had. Would definitely recommend him to the other people for the treatment. ** ****** ******* *** *********** ********* ** ****** **** *** ********* *****
